question.text: You are driving in heavy rain. Your steering suddenly becomes very light. You should

explanation.text: If the steering becomes light in these conditions it is probably due to a film of water that has built up between your tyres and the road surface. Easing off the accelerator should allow your tyres to displace the film of water and they should then regain their grip on the road.

answer.text: steer towards the side of the road
